page.title: 12A CHILDS DAY
page.content: First of all I have breakfast then leave for school,when I get there I do Maths,English,and Project etc. Then playtime, and after that we do Maths followed by lunch. In the afternoon we have talks from people in the class.Then we have games, we play cricket,rounders or football with the headmaster.Then we go home,I go to Robert Mullins' house to play,I get there and we play in his camp in his garage. I go home and have my tea.Then I watch the television followed by a game of football with my brother.Then I come in and have my supper and watch more television, feed my cats. Then I go upstairs and have a wash and clean my teeth before going to bed.
